title: ✨Everything You Need. All Right Here at Madison Bellevue✨
posting_body: ['What You Waiting For!', 'Give Us a Call Today!', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Federal law prohibits housing discrimination on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, familial status, or disability.', '* Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.', "You'll love where we're located!", 'The Madison Bellevue Apartments', '885 154th Place NE', 'Bellevue, WA 98007', 'Madison Bellevue is conveniently located near shopping centers, movie theater, restaurants, parks, etc.', 'You have everything you need steps away from your door.', 'Our community features luxury amenities including a state-of-the-art fitness center with guided fitness programs, an indoor Olympic size swimming pool, garages, and a community clubhouse.', 'Community Amenities', 'Controlled Building Access • State-of-the-art Fitness Center • Indoor Olympic Sized Heated Pool •', 'On-Site Maintenance • On-Site Management • Online Resident Portal • Free Weights • Playground • Near Public Transportation • Guided Fitness Program', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Stainless Steel Efficient Appliances • Full Size Washer/Dryer •', 'Quartz Counter-tops • Gas Range*', 'Available and ready to help!', 'Mon-Fri:', '9AM-6PM', 'Sat - Sun:', '10AM-5PM', 'Your furry friends are our furry friends!', ' Pets - Max 2 allowed Cats -  allowed, Rent $25.00, Deposit $200.00', 'Comments:', 'A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.', 'Dogs -  allowed, Rent $25.00, Deposit $200.00', 'Comments:', 'Breed restrictions apply.', '\xa0 A deposit and rent charge is required for each pet.']
